comment: Example configuration for connectivity matrix extraction

comments.file_formats: Script supports both .fib.gz and .fz fiber files automatically
comments.dsi_studio_cmd: Full path to DSI Studio executable (use 'dsi_studio' if in PATH)
comments.usage_note: Input/output paths, pilot mode, batch mode are specified via command line arguments
comments.smoothing: Fraction of previous direction to mix in (0-1)
comments.min_length: Minimum fiber length in mm (0=dataset specific)
comments.max_length: Maximum fiber length in mm (0=dataset specific)
comments.check_ending: Drop tracks not terminating in ROI (0=off, 1=on)
comments.connectivity_values_note: Available metrics depend on reconstruction method used
